post.author: KIM JEONG KWON
post.content:
1> How to send messages to a child process from parent process?
2> Explain the command/function-name which can solve the bit order problem in network.
3> Explain about the TCL.
4> Explain the difference between Shell and PERL.
5> How can you setup the OS and Network in UNIX system
6> Explain the major difference between JAVA & JAVABEANS
7> Explain the major difference between JAVA & C (C++)
8> How can you do memory management in JAVA or C/C++
9> If you want to see the process ID what command will you use?
10> Explain the Group ID in UNIX
11> Explain about the UNIX PLATFORM
12> Explain why you used the SNMP in Network Management System.
13> Recent version of JAVA.
14> How did you used the ORACLE
15> Explain about the gdb (debugger)
16> If \\"core dump\\" occured how can you catch the bug?
post.title: Sample \\"Interview Questions\\"
